summary: An emotionally immature underwater photographer returns home to an affair with his best friend's deaf girlfriend and unresolved issues with the wife he left six months before.
cast: David La Haye|Isabelle Blais|Emmanuel Bilodeau|Chantal Giroux|Pascale Desrochers|Vincent Bilodeau|Charles Turpin|Paul Ahmarani|Sylvain Bellemare|Thai-Hoa Le|Sophie Prégent
title: Un crabe dans la tête
